mapper.insert: insert into T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK ( GROUP_NO, MEMBER_NO, M_DATE, M_MEMO, M_MONEY, M_LEFT, M_RIGHT, M_TYPE ) values ( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{mDate}, #{mMemo}, #{mMoney}, #{mLeft}, #{mRight}, #{mType} )
mapper.select: select M_NO as mNo, GROUP_NO as groupNo, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, M_DATE as mDate, M_MEMO as mMemo, M_MONEY as mMoney, M_TYPE as mType, M_LEFT as mLeft, M_RIGHT as mRight, reg_date as regDate from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK order by M_NO desc limit 1

select M_NO as mNo, GROUP_NO as groupNo, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, M_DATE as mDate, M_MEMO as mMemo, M_TYPE as mType, M_MONEY as mMoney, M_LEFT as mLeft, M_RIGHT as mRight, reg_date as regDate from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK where group_no = #{groupNo} order by m_no desc limit 0, 19

select M_NO as mNo, GROUP_NO as groupNo, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, M_DATE as mDate, M_MEMO as mMemo, M_TYPE as mType, M_MONEY as mMoney, M_LEFT as mLeft, M_RIGHT as mRight, reg_date as regDate from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK where group_no = #{groupNo} and date_format(M_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by m_no desc
select IFNULL(SUM(M_MONEY), 0) as mMoney from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK where group_no = #{groupNo} and M_RIGHT like CONCAT('%', '신용카드+', '%') and date_format(M_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{mDate}
select IFNULL(SUM(M_MONEY), 0) as mMoney from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK where group_no = #{groupNo} and M_RIGHT like CONCAT('%', '현금-', '%') and date_format(M_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{mDate}

select IFNULL(SUM(M_MONEY), 0) as money, date_format(M_DATE, '%Y-%m') as startDate from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK where group_no = #{groupNo} and date_format(M_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{startDate} and m_type = 1

select IFNULL(SUM(M_MONEY), 0) as money, date_format(M_DATE, '%Y-%m') as startDate from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK where group_no = #{groupNo} and date_format(M_DATE, '%Y-%m') = #{startDate} and m_type = 2
